title: China's Small Data AI Gains Edge in Manufacturing, as Industry Experts Debate U.S.-China AI Competition
description: GUANGZHOU, China, Jan. 22, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Insights emerging from a recent industrial AI forum, where Dayin Technology participated alongside leading experts, have brought renewed focus to the deepening divergence in U.S.-China artificial intelligence development. As the global race for AI dominance intensifies, China is carving out a distinct lead in one critical arena: the integration of AI with industrial manufacturing. This is propelled by a clear national strategy. While the U.S. pours vast resources into AIGC (AI-Generated Content) and foundational model research, China is executing a determined, policy-driven push for 'AI+Industrial Manufacturing.' The result is a pivotal divergence: as the U.S. explores AI's creative frontiers, China is systematically deploying it to solidify its position as the world's workshop.
content: GUANGZHOU, China, Jan. 22, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Insights emerging from a recent industrial AI forum, where Dayin Technology participated alongside leading experts, have brought renewed focus to the deepening divergence in U.S.-China artificial intell... [4518 chars]

title: AI Tools for Business Made Simple for Solopreneurs and Small Teams
description: Artificial intelligence is often presented to business owners as something powerful, complex, and slightly intimidating. Dashboards promise efficiency. Features promise scale. For many solopreneurs and small teams, this framing feels detached from daily reality.
